GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
eth: sp7021: fix use after free bug in spl2sw_nvmem_get_mac_address

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 99e229c7fe30a1661f9f306b3df06eaf1db064aa, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit fd3040b9394c58bcedb83554bcf1a073021d6b36. For more details please see the references link.
